text: The Bayer designation b Cygni is shared by three stars in the constellation Cygnus: *b1 Cygni (V2008 Cygni), an RS CVn variable *b2 Cygni (V1624 Cygni), a Be star *b3 Cygni (V1644 Cygni), a δ Scuti variable ==See also== Albireo (β Cygni) Cygni, b Category:Cygnus (constellation)
title: B Cygni
